title: Hudson Yards Executive Offices
titleCn: 哈德逊园区行政办公室
coverImageAltCn: 哈德逊园区办公室前台

overview.body: A 12,000 sq ft corporate headquarters designed to communicate innovation and trust. The client — a leading financial firm — required spaces that balanced executive gravitas with collaborative energy.
overview.bodyCn: 一个12,000平方英尺的企业总部，旨在传达创新和信任。客户——一家领先的金融公司——需要平衡行政庄重感与协作活力的空间。

gallery.altCn: 带定制木工的开放办公区

testimonial.quote: Julia Studio transformed our office into a space that genuinely reflects who we are as a firm. Clients and staff alike are consistently impressed.
testimonial.quoteCn: Julia Studio 将我们的办公室改造成真正反映我们公司形象的空间。客户和员工都对此赞叹不已。
testimonial.author: Managing Director, Financial Services Firm

seo.title: Hudson Yards Executive Offices — Julia Studio
seo.description: 12,000 sq ft corporate headquarters in Hudson Yards. Modern design balancing executive gravitas with collaborative energy.
